item.title: Daily Briefing - 2026-02-17
item.description:

**3) UK response signals** The UK government reiterated support for Ukraine amid rising tensions in Eastern Europe. New sanctions targeting specific Russian individuals will be implemented. The Prime Minister emphasized continued military assistance.
**4) Legal/docket watch** No new developments in Epstein-related cases today. Legal proceedings remain ongoing, but no significant announcements are expected.
